item.title: CVE-2022-32280|2024-09-16T22:14:12.691Z -- xakuro -- xo%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (contributor or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Xakuro's XO Slider plugin <= 3.3.2 at WordPress.
